is_html.description: Indicates if `message_body` is HTML; if True, body must be valid HTML, if False, body should not contain HTML tags. Please provide a value of type boolean.
is_html.title: Is Html

message_body.description: Content of the reply message, either plain text or HTML. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
examples: Dear Sir, Nice talking to you. Yours respectfully, John
message_body.title: Message Body

recipient_email.description: Primary recipient's email address. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
recipient_email.title: Recipient Email

thread_id.description: Identifier of the Gmail thread for the reply. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
thread_id.title: Thread Id

user_id.description: Identifier for the user sending the reply; 'me' refers to the authenticated user. Please provide a value of type string.
user_id.title: User Id

value.description: Sends a reply within a specific gmail thread using the original thread's subject, requiring a valid `thread id` and correctly formatted email addresses. supports attachments via the `attachment` parameter with valid `s3key`, `mimetype`, and `name`.
value.display_description: Sends a reply within a specific gmail thread using the original thread's subject, requiring a valid `thread id` and correctly formatted email addresses. supports attachments via the `attachment` parameter with valid `s3key`, `mimetype`, and `name`.
value.name: gmail_reply_to_thread

other_contacts.description: Include 'Other Contacts' (interacted with but not explicitly saved) in search results; if false, searches only primary contacts. Please provide a value of type boolean.
other_contacts.title: Other Contacts

pageSize.description: Maximum results to return; values >30 are capped to 30 by the API. Please provide a value of type integer.
pageSize.title: Pagesize

person_fields.description: Comma-separated fields to return (e.g., 'names,emailAddresses'); see PersonFields enum. If 'other_contacts' is true, only 'emailAddresses', 'names', 'phoneNumbers' are allowed. Please provide a value of type string.
person_fields.title: Person Fields

query.description: Matches contact names, nicknames, email addresses, phone numbers, and organization fields. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
query.title: Query

value.description: Searches contacts by matching the query against names, nicknames, emails, phone numbers, and organizations, optionally including 'other contacts'.
value.display_description: Searches contacts by matching the query against names, nicknames, emails, phone numbers, and organizations, optionally including 'other contacts'.
value.name: gmail_search_people

draft_id.description: The ID of the draft to send. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
draft_id.title: Draft Id

user_id.description: The user's email address. The special value `me` can be used to indicate the authenticated user. Please provide a value of type string.
user_id.title: User Id

value.description: Sends the specified, existing draft to the recipients in the to, cc, and bcc headers.
value.display_description: Sends the specified, existing draft to the recipients in the to, cc, and bcc headers.
value.name: gmail_send_draft

attachment.description: File to attach; ensure `s3key`, `mimetype`, and `name` are set if provided. Omit or set to null for no attachment.
attachment.title: Attachment

bcc.description: Blind Carbon Copy (BCC) recipients' email addresses.
bcc.title: Bcc

body.description: Email content (plain text or HTML); if HTML, `is_html` must be `True`. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
examples: Hello team, let's discuss the project updates tomorrow.
body.title: Body

extra_recipients.description: Additional 'To' recipients' email addresses (not Cc or Bcc).
extra_recipients.title: Extra Recipients

is_html.description: Set to `True` if the email body contains HTML tags. Please provide a value of type boolean.
is_html.title: Is Html

recipient_email.description: Primary recipient's email address. Please provide a value of type string. This parameter is required.
recipient_email.title: Recipient Email

subject.description: Subject line of the email. Please provide a value of type string.
subject.title: Subject

user_id.description: User's email address; the literal 'me' refers to the authenticated user. Please provide a value of type string.
user_id.title: User Id

value.description: Sends an email via gmail api using the authenticated user's google profile display name, requiring `is html=true` if the body contains html and valid `s3key`, `mimetype`, `name` for any attachment.
value.display_description: Sends an email via gmail api using the authenticated user's google profile display name, requiring `is html=true` if the body contains html and valid `s3key`, `mimetype`, `name` for any attachment.
value.name: gmail_send_email
